title: Unknown CMake command "cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags"
body_html:
I have this error while building pytorch from source with gtx1060, cuda9.2, and cudnn7.1.4 on ubuntu 16.04

-- Caffe2: Found protobuf with new-style protobuf targets.
-- Caffe2: Protobuf version 3.5.0
-- Caffe2: CUDA detected: 9.2
-- Caffe2: CUDA nvcc is: /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
-- Caffe2: CUDA toolkit directory: /usr/local/cuda
-- Caffe2: Header version is: 9.2
-- Found cuDNN: v7.1.4 (include: /usr/local/cuda/include, library: /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7)
CMake Error at /home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/cuda.cmake:338 (cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags):
Unknown CMake command "cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags".
Call Stack (most recent call first):
/home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/share/cmake/Caffe2/Caffe2Config.cmake:79 (include)
CMakeLists.txt:7 (FIND_PACKAGE)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/build/libshm/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/build/libshm/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --with-cuda --with-nnpack nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD'

body:
I have this error while building pytorch from source with gtx1060, cuda9.2, and cudnn7.1.4 on ubuntu 16.04

-- Caffe2: Found protobuf with new-style protobuf targets.
-- Caffe2: Protobuf version 3.5.0
-- Caffe2: CUDA detected: 9.2
-- Caffe2: CUDA nvcc is: /usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
-- Caffe2: CUDA toolkit directory: /usr/local/cuda
-- Caffe2: Header version is: 9.2
-- Found cuDNN: v7.1.4  (include: /usr/local/cuda/include, library: /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7)
CMake Error at /home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/cuda.cmake:338 (cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags):
  Unknown CMake command "cuda_select_nvcc_arch_flags".
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  /home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/share/cmake/Caffe2/Caffe2Config.cmake:79 (include)
  CMakeLists.txt:7 (FIND_PACKAGE)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
See also "/home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/build/libshm/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log".
See also "/home/dat/.py/pytorch/torch/lib/build/libshm/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log".
Failed to run 'bash tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --with-cuda --with-nnpack nccl caffe2 nanopb libshm gloo THD'
